entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 9:42 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
